title: Ticket #3733: Cross Tests in Batlab
description:
We desire to run cross test of Window 8 or 7 on XP and RedHat 6 on SL 6

Upon looking into mechanisms in condor_nmi_submit, it looked much as it had and that perhaps we just had to define some. Seems to still be working. I only was doing a single test but my next test will be a full set of tests.

At the moment they can only be seen via Personal Runs(Old View)
creator: bt
